sourceDesc.p: A TEI file created from Ethio-SPaRe data

revisionDesc.change: transformed from mycore to TEI P5

note.desc: The chuch was possibly founded by the local community.
note.ab: Tābots (at least four): Mary, Michael, Kidāna Mǝḥrat, ʾAnānyā.

The church photographed by Denis Nosnitsin for EAP project Preservation of the historical literary heritage of Tigray, Ethiopia: the library of Romanat Qeddus Mika'el (EAP254).
70 Mss. photographed: RQM-001 "Homily in honour of the Four Animals"; RQM-002 "Synaxarion"; RQM-003 "Synaxarion"; RQM-004 "Four Gospels"; RQM-005 "Dǝggʷā"; RQM-006 "Miracles of Mary"; RQM-007 "Miracles of Mary"; RQM-008 "Acts of the Apostles"; RQM-009 "Vita, miracles, sälam of abba Anania of Däbrä Ṣarabi"; RQM-010 "Liturgical Miscellanea"; RQM-011 "Miracles of Mary"; RQM-012 "The Book of the Funeral Rite"; RQM-013 "Vita of Kiros";
